name: raster-streamlines
description: Generates stramlines as SVG paths from a raster field

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n spp -o build/raster-streamlines.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/raster-streamlines.js -c -m -o build/raster-streamlines.min.js
